pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers
Class AdminGUI_AdminViewEventHandler

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers.ComponentEventHandler
      pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers.AdminGUI_AdminViewEventHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class AdminGUI_AdminViewEventHandler
extends ComponentEventHandler
implements ActionListener

This class handles events dispatched from the gui-components in AdminView

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011

Method Detail

addEventListeners

private void addEventListeners()
This method adds listeners to the desired components in AdminView. The code to be run when an event is recived is split up into different methods, one for each component/event

handleDishSearchTyping

public void handleDishSearchTyping()
Searches for the contents of the dish search box if something has been written in it. It retrieves all dishes otherwise

handleExtraSearchTyping

public void handleExtraSearchTyping()
Searches for the contents of the extra search box if something has been written in it. It retrieves all extras otherwise

handleDishSelection

private void handleDishSelection(ListSelectionEvent e)
handles the event of the user selecting a dish in the dish overview table. Sets up the dish editing UI so that the dish can be edited

Parameters:
e - The listSelectionEvent dispatched by the java AWT thread
